result.execSummary:
The defendant Eugene R Schenk was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Violate/Harassment Restraining Order [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine is to be paid in full by 10-01-2015 or serve 12 days jail with huber as penalty for failure to pay fine.  Court waives DNA surcharge.

Court requires the defendant to enroll and complete a Domestic Violence Course.  Verification of completion to be filed wit the Court by 12-01-2015 or defendant to serve 10 days jail with huber.
AMENDED 08-28-2015:  Court allows defendant to complete Domestic Violence course by 03-01-2016.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Eugene R Schenk

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: filed by Attorney Rustad with copy of certificate showing completion of the New Thresholds Program Course.

filed by Attorney Rustad requesting additional time for the defendant to attend and complete domestic violence counseling.
08/28/15 - Court Reviewed - Request Granted - Do Amended JOC.
Received and filed in court by the State.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Eugene R Schenk in court with attorney Roger Allen Rustad.

Defendant enters a plea of No Contest to the charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the charge.
Victim presented a statement to the court.
Defendant presented a statement to the court.


Court orders the following:
Fine:  $505
DNA Surcharge:  Court Waives.
DV Surcharge:  $100
To be paid in full by:  10/01/15
Alternate: 12  Days in Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
Court requires the Defendant to enroll and complete a Domestic Violence Course, verification of completion to be filed with the court by 12/01/15  or Alternate:  10 Days in Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).

Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Eugene R Schenk in court with attorney Roger Allen Rustad. 
Defense still waiting on discovery.
  Hearing scheduled for July 8, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint except as incidental to pick up and drop off of the children.  Comply with conditions of the injunction.

Defendant Eugene R Schenk in court with attorney Roger Allen Rustad.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 10:30 am.
